text: 1:15-17 Aisaia 49:1; Jeremaia 1:5; Aposel 9:3-6; 9:15; 22:6-10; 26:13-18; Rom 1:1; 11:13; Galesia 2:7Nan amebam tɨghar na batamin dughiamɨn God aposelɨn ikiasa na ginaba. Egha gɨn a nan apangkuvigha ingangarir kam damuasa nan dia. Egha kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, nɨ nan otarimɨn Akar Aghuimɨn gun Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibav kɨnasa, kɨ ifonge. Bizir kam bagha a uan otarim nan akaghasa ifonge. Ezɨ kɨ maghɨra Akar Aghuim gumazamizibav kɨnasa ua tavɨn azarazir puvatɨ. Dughiar kam kɨ aposelɨn faragha ingariba bagha Jerusalemɨn nguibar ekiamɨn ghuavanabozir puvatɨ. Kɨ maghɨra Arebian kantrin ghugha gɨn uamategha Damaskusɨn nguibar ekiamɨn ghu.
